name: Vendah
long_description: Vendah empowers brands in Brazil with an AI-driven WhatsApp sales network, connecting them to a distributed force of sellers who drive revenue through personalized, scalable conversations. By combining technology, data intelligence, and automation, we help brands expand their reach, optimize conversions, and unlock new growth channels in the WhatsApp economy.
one_liner: Empowering brands in LATAM with an AI-driven WhatsApp sales network
